abstract: The company of the Chinese media entrepreneur Bruno Wu announced a new center that is part of his plan to integrate the Chinese film business with that of foreign studios.
snippet: The company of the Chinese media entrepreneur Bruno Wu announced a new center that is part of his plan to integrate the Chinese film business with that of foreign studios.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — Bruno Wu, a Chinese media entrepreneur, is pushing ahead with his previously declared plan to expand the production of global films in China, despite a chill that ran through movie circles last week amid reports that the Securities and Exchange Commission was investigating whether American studios had made illegal payments to officials in China.

headline.main: Making Headway on a Plan to Lure Producers to China
